title: Without You
lyrics:
14 Contributors
Without You Lyrics
[Verse 1]
My heart is a flower
And your love's my sun and rain
My soul is a fire
And your kisses feed the flames
[Pre-Chorus]
Just like the moon that pulls the waves
I'm only moved by your embrace
Just like the stars above us lead the dark to shine
[Chorus]
I can't live without you
No, I can't live without you
In my life
In my life
I can't live without you
No, I can't live without you
In my life
In my life
[Build]
Without you-ou-ou, you-ou
I can't live
Without you-ou-ou, you-ou
I can't live
Without you-ou-ou, you-ou
I can't live
Without you-ou-ou



[Drop]
I can't live without you
I can't live without you
No, I can't live without you
In my life
In my life
[Verse 2]
When I'm underwater you're the breath I likе to hold
Your hands are the only ones to warm mе when I'm cold
[Pre-Chorus]
Just like the moon that pulls the waves
I'm only moved by your embrace
Just like the stars above us lead the dark to shine
[Chorus]
I can't live without you
No, I can't live without you
In my life
In my life
I can't live without you
No, I can't live without you
In my life
In my life



[Build]
Without you-ou-ou, you-ou
I can't live
Without you-ou-ou, you-ou
I can't live
Without you-ou-ou, you-ou
I can't live
Without you-ou-ou
[Drop]
I can't live without you
I can't live without you
No, I can't live without you
In my life
In my life
